comments.body: @cloud-fan You had some concerns of listing all types because we can extend `YearMonthIntervalType`/`DayTimeIntervalType` by precision in the future. So, we cannot list all possible types as we cannot list all possible types of Decimal. WDYT? Could you look at this, please.
It's internal code and I'm OK with this. You mentioned a good point before that we can reuse the sql parser here, and we can refactor this part later.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +177,181 @@      YearMonthIntervalType(YEAR, YEAR),
      YearMonthIntervalType(MONTH, MONTH),
      YearMonthIntervalType(YEAR, MONTH),
      TimestampWithoutTZType)
      .map(t => t.typeName -> t).toMap
